Line 33: Line 33:
===Muhammad ibn Abd-al-Wahhab===
===Muhammad ibn Abd-al-Wahhab===
  +
{{main|Muhammad ibn Abd-al-Wahhab}}
Many Salafis today point instead to [[Muhammad ibn Abd-al-Wahhab]] as the first figure in the modern era to push for a return to the religious practices of the ''salaf as-salih'' or "righteous predecessors".<ref>[http://www.salafipublications.com/sps/sp.cfm?subsecID=SLF02&articleID=SLF020001&articlePages=1 The Principles of Salafiyyah]</ref> His evangelizing in 18th century [[Saudi Arabia]] was a call to return to what were the practices of the early generations of [[Muslim]]s.
Many Salafis today point instead to [[Muhammad ibn Abd-al-Wahhab]] as the first figure in the modern era to push for a return to the religious practices of the ''salaf as-salih'' or "righteous predecessors".<ref>[http://www.salafipublications.com/sps/sp.cfm?subsecID=SLF02&articleID=SLF020001&articlePages=1 The Principles of Salafiyyah]</ref> His evangelizing in 18th century [[Saudi Arabia]] was a call to return to what were the practices of the early generations of [[Muslim]]s.
